message: I don't want all of a fancy and featureful site, just basic models, forms and maybe some views. and it should extend django's auth, because customers are users.
"cms" or "crm"? :P i looked at django-crm at google code, but it looks fairly complex for me...
Oh sorry working to much read it as CMS!
@eMyller I haven't seen one for Django.  Fat-Free-CRM for rails is good though
problem is there are some many case specific detail often in a CRM - but Django could really use a good starting off point app, with flexible models etc
closest to what I was looking for was django-addressbook
I have a start at a project called django-simple-contacts that I'd love to finish out some time
the problem is that the few crm apps out there are bloated as hell; i'm planning to write something simple but easily extensible.
